data.title: Elisabeth (Wiedemann) Evert (1847-1932)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Elisabeth (Wiedemann) Evert born 1847 Mecklenburg, Germany died 1932 Pewaukee, Waukesha, Wisconsin, United States including ancestors + descendants + 1 photos + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Elisabeth Evert formerly Wiedemann

Born 2 Feb 1847 in Mecklenburg, Germany

Ancestors

Daughter of Johann Georg Wiedeman and Sophia Dorothea Zorn

Sister of Johannes Wiedeman [half] and Peter Wiedeman [half]

Wife of Gustav August Johann Friederich Evert — married 20 Dec 1869 [location unknown]

Descendants

Died 12 Aug 1932 at age 85 in Pewaukee, Waukesha, Wisconsin, United States

Profile last modified 28 Dec 2021 | Created 2 Oct 2012

This page has been accessed 567 times.

Biography

Elisabeth was born on 2 February 1847 in Mecklenburg, Germany. She was the daughter of Johann Georg Wiedeman and Sophia Dorothea Zorn.[1]

Elisabeth arrived in the USA in 1869.[1]

When Elisabeth was 22 she married Gustav August Johann Friederich Evert on 20 December 1869. The couple had 7 children: William Frederick Johan Evert, August John Theodore Evert, Albert Rudolph Evert, Louis Magnus Evert, Rudolph Christ Evert, Edward John Evert and Otto William Carl Evert.[1]

In the 1900 census Elisabeth (age 53) was living in Pewaukee village, Waukesha, Wisconsin.[1]

Elisabeth was buried after 12 August 1932 in Forest Hill Cemetery, Pewaukee, WI.

Sources
